it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller

Interface GameController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdrenalineGameController, ScriptedAdrenalineGameController

    public interface GameController
    Object that manages a game's life cycle, it's setup and its teardown. Note that this interface is agnostics to the specific game that can be hosted by the server. GameControllerFactory to see how to create a game controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void recoverGame()
      Recovers a game from the server's disk in order to restore it.
      void runGame()
      Starts the game's life cycle.
      void setupGame(java.util.List<User> users)
      Initializes a new game with the given list of users.
      void userDidDisconnect(User user)
      Notifies the game controller that the given user has disconnected from the hosting lobby.
      void userDidReconnect(User user)
      Notifies the game controller that the given user has reconnected from the hosting lobby.

    • Method Detail

      • setupGame

        void setupGame(java.util.List<User> users)
        Initializes a new game with the given list of users.

      • recoverGame

        void recoverGame()
        Recovers a game from the server's disk in order to restore it. Note that this is not used yet.

      • runGame

        void runGame()
        Starts the game's life cycle. This method has to return only when the game is declared over.

      • userDidDisconnect

        void userDidDisconnect(User user)
        Notifies the game controller that the given user has disconnected from the hosting lobby.

      • userDidReconnect

        void userDidReconnect(User user)
        Notifies the game controller that the given user has reconnected from the hosting lobby.
